name: Don't trust the game
description:
D o    n o t   t r u s t   a n y t h i n g

I had only 2 f*cking days to make this game! I were busy on another game all the time I could've used for this game! ONLY 2 DAYS GUYSE! 

So please forgive me if the game is crap, the UI is crap, that there's only 4 endings and so on. It's because I had no more time ok!

Enjoy the game!

I will probably just abandon this game and never talk about it, so don't expect any updates! seriously
